headline.main: PATROLMAN DONOHUE DEFIES HEALTH BOARD; Bars Home Against Removal of His Son, Ill with Smallpox. " Little Italy" Is Invaded by Policemen and Doctors -- Many New Cases of the Disease.

docs.abstract: Patrolman Donohue Defies Health Board to Remove His Son
